description: Try stacking pancakes for a luxurious breakfast treat. Younger children especially love their sweet fluffiness.
name: Banana, Yoghurt, & Honey Pancake Stack Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the bananas on the diagonal to produce 5cm long strips. Place a warm pancake on a plate and top with a spoonful of yoghurt and slices of banana. Top with another pancake, more yoghurt, banana, and honey. Finish the stack with a third pancake, topped with a spoonful of yoghurt and drizzled generously with honey.
